title: go for the long haul with an integrative approach to health
text: I am 86, started to use various Lost Empire herbs soon after LE started.  A living entity is a too complex network with trillions of connections, to expect miracles from supplements, that happens only with pharma-'bombs' (at the expense of much collateral damage - therefore I never took these). That network  of us has to be overall healthy, to steer it to better performance with 'supplements' (or at my age to maintain health). So, I do since my early 50's on a daily basis: extensive exercise (not to grow muscles, but to keep the 'machinery' smooth incl. the brain) plus freshly cooked 'bio' meals, a very regular bedtime, and a goal in your life.  With this mindset & attitude, I find LE's herbs extremely helpful !! But I take also other specific supplements,  Moreover, living (as a foreigner) in the Swiss mountains (clean air and water from mountain sources), in the only country, where democracy is present between the ears of the people (I lived in the US and in 6 Eur. countries) makes its society highly attractive. In other words, be strategic, see the larger picture, act without hip-shooting, go for the long haul. Do also not get addicted to algorithms (I am an ex-Tech exec) & protocols. Pilots follow protocols, but, thanks God, also know how to fly (I hope).

title: You Are Where You Need To Be
text: I became a Lost Empire Herbs (LEH) customer a few years ago. I had no experience with herbs before I found Lost Empire and have since learned quite a bit and have found some herbs that helped me tremendously. About a year ago another company hit my radar and they sold a few herbal products that intrigued me so I thought I'd venture out and see how they compared. They have some nice products but not nearly the menu that Lost Empire offers. They offered no information on sourcing or purity, the products are more expensive and in my opinion, not as effective. I gave that company a year to win my business and they didn't really reach out like I feel the people at Lost Empire do. That's the real kicker for me. I can send an email or make a phone call and get an answer from somebody the same day or within a few minutes even. The other company had no personality and offered no reassurance on anything. They merely spammed me with gimmicky emails about how I'll miss out unless I respond by midnight etc. I'm not sure how they're going to build trust and confidence by offering no real information on what they sell, not having a phone manned by a real, English speaking person intimately familiar with the company and the products offered, but I suppose most people are used to this type of "interaction" from companies now. Lost Empire is a breath of fresh air in a polluted world so I'm back and staying right here where I started this journey back to optimal health. Excellent products and outstanding service at a very fair price. Why did I ever venture out?

Lost Empire Herbs provides clean, potent herbal products I'm willing to trust with my life.I want to say everything I've bought has worked for me, but that's not the case. There is a limit to what the herbs can do, and a person must sometimes lower their expectations and practice patience.I know that every product I've bought is of the highest quality, clean, and matches the description. It's nice to know I'm getting what I pay for, and if I do my part, I will derive maximum benefit.The staff are knowledgeable and helpful. Products usually arrive earlier than expected. I couldn't ask for more and will always be eternally grateful for finding Lost Empire Herbs.
